FuncDef: This command requests a new certificate from the CA to update an existing certificate due to reasons such askey refreshorreplacing compromised key.
CLIs: key-update ca <ca-profile-name> newkey <key-filename> oldkey <key-filename> oldcert <cert-filename> [ hash-alg <hash-algorithm> ] save-as <save-path-of-result-cert>

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a ca-profile name which includes CMP server information up to 32 characters.
Specifies the key file of the requesting certificate up to 95 characters.
Specifies the key to be replaced up to 95 characters.
Specifies the file name of an imported certificate to be replaced up to 95 characters.
Specifies the hash algorithm for RSA key. Values-md5,sha1,sha224,sha256,sha384,sha512.
Specifies the save full path name of saving the result certificate up to 200 characters.
